hero.subtitle: The first GPS survival game 100% developed by AI. Walk to claim territory, scavenge ruins, and rebuild civilization.

features.title: Game Features
features.realWorldDesc: Walk to claim land. Your footsteps define your empire.
features.scavengeDesc: Explore real-world POIs to find resources and loot.
features.buildDesc: Construct shelters and defend your resources.

aiStory.label: BEHIND THE SCENES
aiStory.title: 100% AI Developed
aiStory.desc: Every line of code, every mechanic, and every pixel of logic was generated by Claude Code. 54,526 lines of code written in just 3 weeks by a single developer.

help.label: RESOURCES
help.title: Help & Support
help.guideDesc: Complete guide covering exploration, territory claiming, building, trading and more gameplay mechanics.
help.supportDesc: Having trouble? Check our FAQ for common issues or contact our support team for help.
